website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung BD-J5900 offers excellent image quality, speedy disc access and great bang for the buck.
pros: The Samsung BD-J5900 is one of the fastest Blu-ray players we've tested for under a hundred dollars
The unit offers decent streaming options, and only a dedicated streaming box will do it better for the same money
cons: The design is unattractive, and the player doesn't offer any basic indicators, not even power
The ergonomics of the remote and the user interface -- especially the "seek" function -- could be improved
Some rivals offer better features for the same price

customer_reviews.title: No power light = huge mistake
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't think a power light would be a big deal. I sure didn't. However, after owning this player for 7 months, I've decided the lack of a power light is a HUGE MONUMENTAL mistake. If you have a cabling issue (i.e. HDMI cable unplugged, power cable unplugged, or just a bad HDMI cable), then you have no way of telling if the unit is on or not without ejecting the disc. This makes troubleshooting a big pain. Playback is great. Menu system is fair. I have had no issues with this player. I would not buy this unit again due to the lack of a power light.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Brake

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: June 2020: Update: this horrible product just got tossed in trash! It stopped working and kept cycling. Not fixes on forums other than take it apart to disable something inside. NOPE. Getting a different one altogether. What a fail. DO NOT BUY! I am not impressed with this product at all. So many times I try to turn it on and nothing happens and you have no idea if it's on or not because there are no indicator lights whatsoever on this item. I will replace it as soon as possible. I can't recommend this one to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C Snyder

customer_reviews.title: I wish there were a "load-eject" button on the remote.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older Samsung Blu-ray Player that started to have issues with skipping. Although it works fine and includes simple, Wi-Fi connectivity to the streaming services I regularly use (NetFlix and Amazon Prime), I have given the unit 4 rather than 5 stars because the remote doesn't have an option to load and eject a DVD. Instead, one has to depress a button on the front of the unit. But the device is so light, that you have to hold it with one hand while depressing the eject button with the other. This is extraordinarily inconvenient if the device is located underneath a large screen TV, and close to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Butzin

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up, excellent picture quality, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research, our daughter asked for one of these for Christmas. Rather than do the same work all over again, I got one for us when our old DVD player turned picky about what DVDs it would play. We have only used the Blu-ray function so far; we haven't played a DVD or used the streaming function yet. I did connect it to a wired Ethernet outlet and updated the firmware. So far it works perfectly. One nice feature is that its remote also controls a Samsung TV, including changing the source, without fiddling with codes. Now we can watch a movie and control both the player and TV with one remote. Picture quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kflier66

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 3D BLU RAY PLAYER!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a few times so far....Very easy to set up....Didn't even look at the manual. Wifi works flawlessly. Screen mirroring works great on my Samsung series 7 t.v.. My Sony 3D player (2010 model) sucks compared to this. I read a bunch of negative reviews on this unit....but put my trust in the Samsung brand....and glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Solerider

customer_reviews.title: Works sometimes
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It's gone from sometimes working to never working. What a mistake this purchase is. Do not buy this POC. This thing is infuriating! There is no display panel, or light to let you know if it's on. Half the time it doesn't turn or or it freezes up and needs to be restarted or unplugged and plugged back in to function. You can't download any additional apps for it. I wish I had gotten something different. I usually like Samsung products. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Us

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this Blu Ray player! It functions really well and is easy to set up, and aesthetically, the size and shape of it blend well with our audio system, also located on the TV stand. We are Amazon Prime members, and the video streaming is very easy to set up on this device. It also allows us to view pictures and videos, which my kids love. The remote control functions well and the directions are pretty intuitive regarding what you are trying to find/ do. We ended up buying 2 of these players for our home, and we are very happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ELECTRONIC EXPRESS & SAMSUNG made me sad - Bye -  Bye
customer_reviews.text: When received (within 1st month), the unit occasionally had to be unplugged and plugged back in for it to power up.We had not been using it very often until we subscribed to Netflix and were using the DVD to access. Four months later it can't be turned on by remote or power button....purchased from ELECTRONICS EXPRESS, who declined to assist in replacement and referred me to manufacturer despite initial issues...- the only repair depot is in NJ. Not sure what it means, but ELECTRONIC EXPRESS Amazon advertisement said this was a 2015 unit so it makes me feel like they bought "stale" units from Samsung (clearance???) and were dumping them on Amazon customer's at a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Phonepd

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 5 months. Now it's not working; no response. Not looking forward to dealing with Samsung warranty, but found their support (using the chat room) was very responsive. And, they provided instructions on how to reset it. I was skeptical at first, but it was pretty simple (unplug device for several seconds). Pleasantly surprised and glad I don't have to deal with a warranty return. Only 'flaw' is that there is no indicator light for this device to show that it's on (or off).
customer_reviews.author: Bluepepper

customer_reviews.title: it would be in the garbage can.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3D blu-ray to play 3D movies on my 3D Plasma...It won't play 3D movies in 3D...When I put a 3D movie in...It starts to play then just completely shuts off about 15 seconds into the movie...I tried this many times with different 3D movies with the same result...Also there is no indicator light to tell you if the unit is on or off...If I didn't pay 85 bucks for the unit, it would be in the garbage can...Very discouraged!
customer_reviews.author: Billnlyn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected from the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Clunky, completely non-elegant interface, and the search feature is very slow as you have to scroll through hundreds of characters to spell a title. Also, when connecting to Amazon or Netflix, it sometimes just goes black and we have to power cycle the unit. One other annoyance that bothers me more than I would expect, there's no power indicator light on the unit. This matters when the screen goes black and we're not sure if it's on. Based on the reviews here, I think it's highly overrated. The 'cast' feature works extremely well however.
customer_reviews.author: Fuse

customer_reviews.title: Does not play movies
customer_reviews.text: I had the player for about 2years. I have never watched a full movie on it. It stops working about 30 minutes into every movie. Of course getting the player to recognize the movie first is the hardest part. I do not recommend this one at all! I am only writing the review now after two years because I need to buy a new DVD player and I do not want anybody to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Connected to 42" Plasma Screen TV picture was great..
customer_reviews.text: Received Blu-Ray Player Yesterday and setup was a breeze...Connected to 42" Plasma Screen TV picture was great.....Very quick in loading DVD's and Blu-Ray Disk...My only complaint so far is that there is no light on the player telling you if it is on or off...Firmware updated immediately....I like the curve style of the unit....
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D. Howard Jr

customer_reviews.title: This player works fine but there a couple of issues
customer_reviews.text: This player works fine but there a couple of issues. There is no on indicator, a light would be an easy fix but when the power button is pressed you cannot tell if the unit comes on unless the TV is first powered up. Second, the is a usb slot in the front but there is a cover that has to be removed, unnecessary and in the way. The curved front is an unnecessary design feature as well, One last thing note that this box only connects to internet with your home wifi, not as fast or secure as an Ethernet hard wire connection.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a comparatively inexpensive blu-ray player that performs that way. It plays discs fine, but has some problems. When a button is pushed on the remote there is no indication the player received the command. It is slow to respond to any inputs from the remote, and sometimes freezes up and has to be reset. The fast forward and reverse functions are difficult to use and jumpy. When using online functions the apps are slow to launch. I definitely would not buy this unit again.
customer_reviews.author: dave153624

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, but only lasted 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: The lack of any lights and the presence of only power and eject buttons was a bit odd at first, but I got used to it. However, if you are diagnosing a problem with your HDMI cable or your power supply, there is no way to know if the unit is turned on or off. The video and audio quality is excellent. My biggest complaint is that after 1.5 years, it froze on the main screen and will not respond to any controls or reset techniques. But since it is so inexpensive, the solution is to just send it to the landfill and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: JeanClaude

customer_reviews.title: Poor features
customer_reviews.text: Poor features. I have been a proponent of Samsung (owned 4 Samsung TVs, Bluray Player, washer &dryer), but Samsung blew this one. There is no LED to tell if the unit is turned off or if you left it ON. It does not have Surround sound, so just stereo. Amazon return was easy and I bought a Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth F.

customer_reviews.title: Initial problems potentially overcome.
customer_reviews.text: Following operation problems with this player and the initial inability to return the item without a significant expense, I posted a very poor review. The seller, DM Electroinics, has now offered to replace the item. Assuning this does happen, a more favorable review would be upcoming and their efforts would be fair, assuming this turns out to be a player that does work and will plug into my system, as I had purchased a much older model specifically because of the RCA plug-ins.Dennis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product from Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. If you experience a screen freeze while streaming a movie, or the remote appears not to be working...unplug everything, reconnect and all should be fine. (It was in my case). I've had to do this twice in 3-4 months. The first time it happened, the DVD downloaded an update from Samsung when I repowered the unit. The absence of a power indicator light on the unit is not a problem for us, as when we turn off the player (smart hub), the tv screen goes back to antenna broadcast---and we know the DVD is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this player to replace a dead Toshiba unit. I was excited about the good reviews of the built in apps but I'm very disappointed. The unit regularly stops responding when using the Netflix app and when it does play, it's choppy and buffers like mad. Pros: - Small size - Intuitive interface Cons: - No power light! (or any lights) - Very poor Netflix performance - Locks up and has to be unplugged to power cycle
customer_reviews.author: Todd G

customer_reviews.title: Take the hint Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the fact that there is NO display. Can't tell whether it is on or off.. Seems like that would be a basic requirement for any piece of electronic equipment. Come on Samsung, spend the extra nickle for an indicator light. Although it works well, would not recommend for issue mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blue ray player for playing dvds
customer_reviews.text: we wanted a blue ray player that plays our dvds with excellent picture quality . this is the player for us. a lot of reviewers complain about wifi and streaming problems. this player is ok streaming movies but it is not the best and I was not looking for a player to stream movies. so far this is working great.
customer_reviews.author: inspector1

customer_reviews.title: Have the firestick and love it!
customer_reviews.text: More times than not when I go into the hulu app, find a show one of my kids wants to watch, select it, (which in itself takes a bit), the sound do any work. I have to power off and repeat the steps to see if it will work again. Very frustrating for a busy mommy and impatient kids! Have the firestick and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kgegg10

customer_reviews.title: Good deal - works well with Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Automatically out of the box, the remote for the Samsung works with my Samsung TV. Woo HOO. I found the set up - to be quick and relatively painless for the Amazon Video and Netflix apps (each app is designed differently so they have different interfaces). The software required an update on the 2nd day, but just like the installation process, it was easy to walk through. I bought this gently used and saved a boat load off the sticker price. Pretty happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleShops

customer_reviews.title: Compact and works OK, with lots of extra useful features (DLNA, apps, etc.); ugly; poor material; no power/function indicators
customer_reviews.text: It works OK and it's compact - and that's all the good things that can be said about it. It's ugly, made with poor material. There is no LED or any other indication whether it is on or not and what it's doing (as an aside, when it's on, it keeps tripping my receiver, forcing it to switch the input to the blu-ray player even if I am watching something else - admittedly, that may be a problem of the receiver, too, but since I can't tell if the blu-ray is on or off, that's annoying). The UI is OK, I tried Netflix and DLNA - all serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: Blast9

customer_reviews.title: It reads discs but not humans
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly fine, and it was dirt cheap compared to other models. I trust the Samsung brand, and got what I paid for. My only gripe is that there is not ONE LED light or anything at all to even communicate that the machine is on besides the very light hum it makes if you put your ear to it. Every time I go to play something, I have to do this little dance with this thing to make sure she is in the mood... which isn't the worst thing that ever happened. I just stream so much that I didn't see the need to invest in a more expensive machine, and I only own one blu-ray.
customer_reviews.author: Edrian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing features for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent "do everything" player. Adding this to your non-smart TV adds the "smart" functions extremely well. In addition to being able to play virtually any type of disc, it provides many streaming service access points and even networks to your home network. This gives us access to home videos and digitized music library from the PC. The up-scaling is quite good, and makes standard DVDs look quite acceptable on HDTVs. I highly recommend the Samsung BD-J5900 Blu-Ray player.
customer_reviews.author: RDM

customer_reviews.title: Fast And Quiet With Only A Few Glitches
customer_reviews.text: It's fast and quiet compared to other Blu-Ray players The only problem it has is when playing 20th Century Fox blu-rays. Fox discs sometimes pause once or twice for one second intervals. Occasional skips also occur on Fox discs. I haven't downloaded any patches yet so I don't know if those fix the problem. Otherwise, it works great as advertised. I can't emphasize how quick and quiet it is, hummmms without any thump-thump-thumping.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good player.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, well packaged, easy to hook up, use, and works fairly well. It does, as many mentioned , turn off frequently when on pause, or not playing, which is great to save energy . I have had it a few weeks now, use it daily. The open close button is not functioning immediately as it did . It needs to be pressed two or three times to close, now, rather than just once. The on/off light that is missing isn't a real big deal, but it would be nice to have one.
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-ray player for the price and size!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Blu-ray player for the size and price. I did some research and, for the features I was seeking, Samsung was the way to go. I'm very happy with it and use it with a portable setup, since it's small enough to throw into my bag with my tiny LED projector. Just to be clear, the top is flat, not curved... hard to tell from the photos, but it's the front and back that are curved.
customer_reviews.author: bluefish123

customer_reviews.title: Nice player and more.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We just play DVDs as we don't have any BluRay discs but it plays them well. I even hooked up my external hard drive and can look at photos, videos and listen to music. The wi-fi works ok too. Like other reviewers, my main comaint is you don't know when the player is on because there is no light. So you either have to check by tuning to the input channel or sometimes you can hear a disc spinning inside. It's a little annoying but what can you do?
customer_reviews.author: YEMSG

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, not so much. Does it work? ...
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, not so much. Does it work? Yes. Is it compact? It is. Does it have all the bells and whistles for internet connectivity, 3D movies and stuff? It surely does. Here's why three instead of five stars: the lack of one lousy, tiny diode. A red LED to tell you the silly thing is on or off. I control all my electronics from a Bose system, and a silly on-off light would sure make things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsman

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This blu-ray player is garbage. First of all it doesn't have a power light - but don't worry, you can still tell whether it's on or off because it sounds like a motorcycle while it's running. It is totally glitchy, and you basically have to do yoga in order to get to that sweet spot where the remote will work. These issues all got worse with time (the glitches were occasional in the first month, incessant now that the return window has closed). Save yourself frustration and money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S

customer_reviews.title: However what I can't deal with is the fact that it stops playing the movie before I even start a movie I've learned I have to un
customer_reviews.text: No power indicator to tell when the Blu-ray player is on this is not a problem I can deal with that. However what I can't deal with is the fact that it stops playing the movie before I even start a movie I've learned I have to unplug and restart the Blu-ray player to get a decent performance out of it still better than the Sony I have before but not much... I need you to spend a few extra bucks and buy a better player because this one completely sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ward

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple of years ago. Nothing but trouble, always freezing up, etc. Watched about a dozen movies with it before it finally just stopped working. I still don't understand why any company would make a DVD player with NO LED's on it. Why wouldn't they at least put an "On/Off" light at least to tell you if there is even power to it.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Freezes after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a year and it one day it wouldn't start. Neither remote (with fresh batteries) nof buttons on player itself would do anything. Unplugged it and upon reconnecting it finally showed home screen, but then locked on that screen. Tried same procedure several times, but kept locking on home screen. I agree with other reviewers that the lack of a on/off light is really annoying - you can't tell when it's really off of on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: & 3D discs just fine. Connected to a Samsung UHD set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my BD F7500 which absolutely failed after 13 months. At less than half the price of that miserable F7500 the BD- J5900 does what it is supposed to do. It played the discs installed, DVD, Bl-ray, & 3D discs just fine. Connected to a Samsung UHD set, the picture was just fine. If you are looking for a reasonably priced Blu-ray, 3D player, this is a good choice. If your UHD TV upscales to near UHD quality, then all you really is a basic Blu-ray player.
customer_reviews.author: elderslie

customer_reviews.title: Junk, 5 months after purchase and I can't stand ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk, 5 months after purchase and I can't stand it anymore! The device freezes between netflix episodes and the screen goes black. The only way to fix it is to unplug it or switch the surge protector off. Thought there was an electricity issue at first and tried different outlets and surge protectors. Didn't work. There is clearly an issue with this device, I have reset and update too many times to count. Wifi is also difficult connect. DO NOT BUY. Update: Still junk, its in a million pieces as my anger and frustration got the better of me. I will never buy a samsung product again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Huston

customer_reviews.title: First off this player has several features that are needed ...
customer_reviews.text: First off this player has several features that are needed for Home entertainment. 3D/wifi /apps/Android device cast etc., Yet, their seems to be a major problem. The unit automatically reboots for no reason. Not sure why, but started happening after firmware update. I could see complaints registered in consumeraffairs, cnet forums etc., and looks samsung have not rectified this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Vel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic BLue-Ray player. I haven't used the 3D capability, but it is easy to use, has a great interface, works naturally on a Samsung tv without further programming, and is actually a good interface for watching Netflix and Amazon prime- more intuitive and easier to use than my $130 roku 4... Makes me feel dumb for getting the roku. So I moved the roku to a different tv. Seriously, this is a great product- I'd buy again and recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Osteodoc

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS IF YOU WANT HULU OR AMAZON.  SOFTWARE NO LONGER SUPPORTS THEM.
customer_reviews.text: Just spend an hour on the phone with Samsung Customer Support. Finally they tell me that their software has changed and it no longer supports Amazon or Hulu or anything more than Netflix basically. Wasted time and very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sue Payne

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a power on light - very bad as it gets turned on by accident easily and ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, does not have a full web browser as description indicated. Does not have a power on light - very bad as it gets turned on by accident easily and then stays on for long periods undetected. App to allow use with my TV Tuner is not available. Plays DVD's well just isn't as SMART as it should be for my intended uses.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Serious problems
customer_reviews.text: terrible product. had nothing but trouble. After three months of suffering with this product, finally just took the loss and bought myself a Sony which works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Built in wi fi sucks
customer_reviews.text: Wi fi quits after a ten and a half months of use...I have 2 of these. 1in LR, 1 in BR. Same thing. Can not connect to internet after minimal use. Unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Juli T. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, even with no power light indicator
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Yes, it would be nice to have a power light to indicate when it's on, but I turn it off before I turn off the TV, and the TV says that it is no longer receiving a signal from the CD player. That confirms that it's off, and then I turn off the TV.
customer_reviews.author: old salt

customer_reviews.title: Limited AV outputs.
customer_reviews.text: Be ware, no RCA audio output. If you have a television without proper audio outs, you will have to use an audio coaxial cable to get sound out to an audio source. (Obviously the HDMI sends audio to the television, but the television in this case has very bad sound.)
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few more $ and get an "ON" light.
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be 3D ready but so far it hasn't worked for 3D and this may be the Projector but it's 3D ready as well. There seems to be no help in the Projector on line world that a regular person can understand as to why I can't play 3D movies. And there's no light telling you it's on. I would have paid extra for an LED bulb that say's "ON".
customer_reviews.author: tomp

customer_reviews.title: Very good and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Very good, inexpensive blue-ray player. It doesn't take up too much space. The only drawback is that there is no light to tell if it is turned on. I was aware that there was no light when I made the purchase. After a lot of research, I found that the best rated players had no on/off lights. I don't think it is a big deal, because I turn it off when I am done using it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, just make sure to fix the audio settings
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far. The one minor gripe is that it came with the audio preset to downmix all content to PCM stereo. Presumably this is the most compatible setting for folks who aren't particularly tech literate. In any case, it was a quick and straightforward fix once I realized that stuff that should have been playing in surround wasn't. I am not deducting any stars for this.
customer_reviews.author: Rylan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Blu-ray for the past few years and it is still running great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little player with one significant defect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It has all of the features I want, and I especially like that it does Netflix and Amazon video streaming, but... There isn't as much as a single light on the outside of the unit, so it's impossible to tell if it's on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Woods

customer_reviews.title: with this product I plugged in the HDMI cable and now I can enjoy Netflix and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Have an older Samsung HD TV, with this product I plugged in the HDMI cable and now I can enjoy Netflix and Amazon. This Blu Ray Player has built in WiFi. When installing it the instructions were easy and you are guided through to update it prior to using it. The Samsung people were very helpful. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklawn gal

customer_reviews.title: Hope it was a fluke
customer_reviews.text: Updated 7/28/17 to say the replacement one has been fine. Still could use a power indicator light. Original 1-star review:It was great until it just quit working. Lack of a power on indicator is annoying. The fact that it died just 2 weeks after the return window ended really sucks. However, Amazon is AWESOME, and they are processing the return. I really appreciate their terrific customer service. Decided to order a new one of these based on advice that Samsung has a good reputation and this was probably just a bad unit. Will update the review after using the replacement for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This player is excellent! All the features work great and the price was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and could not connect to WiFi. The player was defective. Spent several hours online with Samsung trying every trick in the book-incredibly frustrating being that I'm a tech geek and fully understand the simplicity of a basic WiFi connection. Samsung wanted me to send it in for repairs, which would take several weeks, when it was brand new out of the box and broken. No way! Amazon kindly sent me a new one which instany connected to WiFi with ease. Happy with this one, although not having a power light is a bit of an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sedani

customer_reviews.title: The unit inside was in great condition and works fine
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression this was new. The products box was obviously opened and resealed poorly with packing tape. The unit inside was in great condition and works fine. It was missing the HDMI cables that were to be included. Somewhat disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: igotthelife!!!

customer_reviews.title: plays the disks and streams some.channels
customer_reviews.text: plays dvd well smart apps.good for.those with non smart tv
customer_reviews.author: sci fi Steve

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Blu-Ray player
customer_reviews.text: This Blu-Ray player absolutely boggles my mind. On the one hand, it does actually play Blu-Ray discs which is its main purpose for existing. On the other hand, it freezes up rather frequently when doing something as simple as watching Netflix. I get that this isn't the most expensive player out there, but the format has been out for over 10 years. The fact that these players have such glaring problems is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Spiff

customer_reviews.title: seemingly for good.
customer_reviews.text: Been problematic from the beginning, often requiring yanking the plug from the wall to make it reboot and work. Now after ten months it has died, seemingly for good.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Spieckerman

customer_reviews.title: It only affects the ability to adjust volume and turn the TV on and off but would have been nice to know ahead of time
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that certain features on the remote only work with Samsung TVs. That should have been clearly stated in the product description. It only affects the ability to adjust volume and turn the TV on and off but would have been nice to know ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: No Power-On-Lite is a Major Design Flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. No Power-on-lite is a Major design flaw. Makes you wonder what is going on...you hit the button on the front, wait, look for the report...hit buttons there, then back on the front panel. Funny to watch my wife try to get it going...but all that pain to save 2 cents for an LED.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice blu ray player loaded with apps
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung blu ray player gives very good quality picture on the screen when connected to tv. It comes with apps like netflix, amazon video, hulu and more, which is cool. It can play blu ray and dvd discs. Although this blu ray player is not region free, it seems to be playing dvds and blu ray discs from outside the US. The problem is that it does not have any led indicators in the front panel to know if it is on or off. It works very nicely with our 40 inch tv.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Exactly after 90 days it now has an intermittent problem, it keeps shutting down and rebooting itself and starting the DVD over again. VERY ANNOYING.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is fast and works great. I have an Sony tv and a Samsun ...
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is that there is no light to let u know it is on. Other than that it is fast and works great. I have an Sony tv and a Samsun the remote TV functions work with the Samsun but don't work with the Sonny. I haven't found a way to code the remote for the Sonny.
customer_reviews.author: BLP

customer_reviews.title: All you can ask for in a 3D blu Ray player!
customer_reviews.text: This 3D blu Ray is everything you need and more! The only issue is there is no power on/off indicator. This is the only reason I did not give it 5 stars. Easily able to set up and the remote is superb...it even controls other devices! I purchased this item and a couple days later I am returning it. As I was playing a blu Ray, it began making weird noises and freezing the movie. I'm okay because every item made cannot be perfect. I contacted Amazon and they delivered another one to me the next day (Sunday). Pretty impressive! Being an Amazon prime member does make a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I generally LOVE Samsung products
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews. Most of the time I figure you pay for what you get. However, I generally LOVE Samsung products. We have 3 Samsung smart tv's, 2 Samsung phones, Samsung washer and dryer. I mean, seriously, Samsung is awesome. Except for this product. I thought the first one I bought was defective and returned it. The replacement has stopped working now after 4 months. I think we have used it maybe 10 times. Absolute piece of junk. And apparently we are no longer allowed to return it! I'm not sure how Samsung is okay even putting their name on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I find strange about this product is the lack of any light to let you know if it's on or off. Otherwise, (and it's replacing an older Samsung player taken out in a lightning strike), this performs great.
customer_reviews.author: LiamC

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working on june 30 2020 purchase june 9 2018
customer_reviews.author: Smith & wesson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn on!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it that much and when I did, I would have to unplug it and plug it back in just to get it to turn on! Very, very frustrating! Waste of my money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes get it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The product is great, I love how compatible it is with all of our devices (I'm kind of a Samsung fangirl to be honest but hey), and it's a huge improvement over our other one. The only thing I would change about it is that I wish it had some sort of light on it that showed when it was turned on or off. It's a tiny inconvenience to have to turn the TV on to tell if the Bluray is on, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laurasaur

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Streamer
customer_reviews.text: I owned another Samsung before, not this model, what I liked is how easy the set up was. Took no time at all to get it streaming. If you are thinking about getting a Roku or other streamer, you might as well get this and be able to play Blu-ray and stream as well.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it does not have Spotify (which I should ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a lot of research. Disappointed that it does not have Spotify (which I should have looked into prior to purchasing) and it could be faster when loading apps / content. It's faster than the last Sony dvd player I had, but it's no Roku.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Has Amazon Video App
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this player, It has many apps even more the the non 3d model. it has Amazon Prime on this which the old one does not so not you can use this to stream from your Amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Ripitywitt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This DVD/BluRay player looks like a block of black plastic. No lights to show On or disc process. Setup was easy. The Samsung unit I am replacing appeared higher quality with lights and a metal top. But, perhaps this unit will function better. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I chose this one while on sale on Black Friday. It is certainly better than the DVD player it replaced. I have had no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Requadt

customer_reviews.title: UPDates break the player... and Samsung is ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDates break the player... and Samsung is of no help when you try to get the update for it with USB.. their customer service is redic
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Netflix not working... AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I've had to reset this player more times than I can remember. The missing light is a really bad thing when you don't know if it is even on while troubleshooting. These devices should be foolproof by now. Why is it so hard to make a quality product?
customer_reviews.author: A. Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D Player at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. It works great for the money, it plays all of my 3d movies great, even better than my expensive one that I keep having problems with that I bought a little over a year ago and got it replaced only a couple of months ago and now having problems with the new one. I'm very happy with it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DGM

customer_reviews.title: it worked fine for about a year
customer_reviews.text: Well, it worked fine for about a year. Then it started having all sorts of trouble finding the wifi, dropping the wifi. It is basically non-functional as a streaming device. It was always slow on the menus, but functional. A web search now shows me that Samsung players have had consistent problems with streaming Netflix. Wish I had known it. I bought Samsung because it was the same brand as the tv, after years of using a Sony... a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Macfarland

customer_reviews.title: No operational problems with unit. Only thing negative is ...
customer_reviews.text: No operational problems with unit. Only thing negative is that it doesn't have a power indication light on the face. Don't know if its on or not.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R Rynearson

customer_reviews.title: good replacement for my LG
customer_reviews.text: good replacement for my LG, but there is no light telling when unit is on. the remote is picky with batteries and at times doesn't work. can't open or close cd drawer with remote. good picture and sound quality and that is why three stars.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Rothschild

customer_reviews.title: Good All Around!
customer_reviews.text: Really don't have any complaints - it's easy to use, small and compact, very fast and has a great picture quality - I have a Samsung TV, so it's a very compatible device, I can use my TV remote - fairly priced
customer_reviews.author: Russ Haig

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: It will only play dvds and NOT blue ray disks. It just sits on the load screen no matter which blue ray movie I try to play. And in my opinion the quality of the dvds is weird and graney. The dvd player in my tv has better picture quality. Really disappointed with this product. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: KellyK

customer_reviews.title: No light.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. The only thing is there is no light at all to tell if it is on or off.
customer_reviews.author: MY Reviews

customer_reviews.title: dumb
customer_reviews.text: No light or any indication when it's on. should have sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Chasm

customer_reviews.title: it's a good price / performance product
customer_reviews.text: This blu-ray player loads really quickly which was a feature I was looking for. I wasn't looking for all the bells and whistles and honestly this player has more features than I will ever use, it's a good price / performance product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Victor

customer_reviews.title: Fast BluRay load times and fast apps... ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast BluRay load times and fast apps ... but c'mon, not even a tiny little $0.01 power indicator LED to know if I have to get up and toggle the power or just simply switch my TV input over and the kids can watch the rest of their movie from the night before?
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cy

customer_reviews.title: I cant recommend this product and in looking for a solution on ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours since Dec 2016 - 8 months. No indicator so you can't tell if it is on or off. And in the last few months it has started turning itself off OR won't turn on. I cant recommend this product and in looking for a solution on the internet, it seems many are having this same issue.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March of 2017. Worked just fine until it decided to die today. Appliances should last at least 2 years. At least!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just one dislike, there re no lights of any kind to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just one dislike,there re no lights of any kind to tell if the player is on or off, to make more confusing, it's paired with a Samsung TV and the remotes are almost identical. Very irritating. I labeled the player remote to tell them apart. I have Sony that is much more user friendly. No more Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Gendico

customer_reviews.title: Had to send unit back to Samsung for "repair" within ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to send unit back to Samsung for "repair" within a few months of purchase. Repair was unsuccessful first time. Ended up buying a Panasonic unit in between "repairs" and now this Samsung unit is basically a paperweight. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M

customer_reviews.title: It would be tremendously better if it just had an on off indicator light
customer_reviews.text: It would be tremendously better if it just had an on off indicator light. It works well but you can't tell if you are turning it on or off! I also wish the remote were universal...unfortunately Samsung only make them universal for Samsung products.
customer_reviews.author: StorkRN

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last July, 13 months later it. will. not. turn. on. We thought it was the batteries at first, but it's just not working. And I hate that there's no indicator light to let you know if it was on or not. Stinks that this only lasted about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mika

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It works. It's small enough to hide. Design is coil. It works. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Tess B

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with a SONOS 5.1 surround system.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this if you have a SONOS 5.1 system. It is an inexpensive solution because the unit down samples to Dolby digital.
customer_reviews.author: William Buckley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This Player stopped working after just a month of use. Won't even turn on anymore. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothia Chitwood

customer_reviews.title: But nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Should have come in a box aside from the actual blue ray box for shipping safety. But nice product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and use. I was looking for a new Blu-Ray player that was Prime compatible. This is just what I was looking for. I was able to quickly set up Prime, Vudu, and Netflix, and now I can watch movies whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: BrigitteGC

customer_reviews.title: fine till recently
customer_reviews.text: bought about a year ago...now its dead. was great up until that point.
customer_reviews.author: Cleatus

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much, but wish it had an on/ off light on the front so you would know whether or not it is on. The size is great, small and unobtrusive. Sleek design. Very happy with it overall. Easy to connect and us.
customer_reviews.author: Linney

product_meta.title: Samsung BD-J5900 Curved 3D Blu-ray Player with Wi-Fi (2015 Model)

Available Apps: Youtube, Netflix, Yupp TV, Pandora, Amazon
